technology: There were no technical difficulties experienced by the participant.
cur_neg_affect: The participant did not express any negative affect about the pandemic/masks/vaccine/boosters in the present.
past_neg_affect: The participant mentioned missing out on her senior year of high school due to the pandemic, indicating some negative affect.
communal_orientation: The participant engaged in conversation and shared her experiences, but did not go above and beyond to build off of the conversation partner's story.
engagement: The participant was engaged in the conversation, sharing her experiences and asking questions.
defensiveness: The participant did not display any defensiveness in justifying her beliefs/perspective.
questions: What was going through your mind when vaccines were rolled out? [00:28:51]

vaccine_importance: The participant got vaccinated and boosted, indicating that she believes that vaccines are extremely important.
booster_importance: The participant got vaccinated and boosted, indicating that she believes that boosters are extremely important.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrated a moderate amount of cognitive complexity by considering different perspectives and analyzing the situation.
general_notes: The participant was very open and willing to share her experiences.
